articles.author: HT Sports Desk
articles.title: Gambhir slammed over wasted chance with Kohli-Rohit move: 'You're not a foreign coach who has to get his equation right' - Hindustan Times
articles.description: Former India cricketer Ashish Nehra did not like Gautam Gambhir's approach in the Sri Lanka ODI series where India have been pushed into a do-or-die situation | Crickit
articles.content: The general approach to using all the resources during a bilateral series is to go with a set playing XI for the opening few matches, get a lead in the contest and then test the bench strength. But w… [+2780 chars]
